version_description:
- Now you can pose two models in one scene
- Improvements on the camera controls
- Lock individual body part positions
- Reset individual body part
- You can now reset just the morphs or just the pose
- Tweaks and bug fixes

- Now you can pose two models in one scene
- Improvements on the camera controls
- Lock individual body part positions
- Reset individual body part
- You can now reset just the morphs or just the pose
- Tweaks and bug fixes

Lots of new features and improvements!

- You can now add props (chairs, tables, geometric shapes, weapons) to the scene
- Attach props to hands
- Landscape support added
- Creatures! You can now transform your model to creature. Five creature head morphs and morphs for hands and feet.
- 60 Preset poses
- You can now pan camera with one finger
- Basic hair
- Dark skin color
- Save and load morphs only
- Added joint rotation for hips, chest and neck
- Transparent screenshots
- Rotate model freely. You can now make it lay down.
- New controls
- Camera position is included in save files.

Lots of new features and improvements!

- You can now add props (chairs, tables, geometric shapes, weapons) to the scene
- Attach props to hands
- Landscape support added
- Creatures! You can now transform your model to creature. Five creature head morphs and morphs for hands and feet.
- 60 Preset poses
- You can now pan camera with one finger
- Basic hair
- Dark skin color
- Save and load morphs only
- Added joint rotation for hips, chest and neck
- Transparent screenshots
- Rotate model freely. You can now make it lay down.
- New controls
- Camera position is included in save files.

-New UI
-Basic clothing
-Lots of new props
-Import images as backdrop
-Unlimited save slots
-Lots of settings for controls, lighting and camera
*Export your current poses as PNG (take screenshot) before updating! Old save poses will not work with current version!

-New UI
-Basic clothing
-Lots of new props
-Import images as backdrop
-Unlimited save slots
-Lots of settings for controls, lighting and camera
